about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Valentine 2020] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Heart Topiary
  • Melting Heart Neon
  • Rose Garland
  • Fresh Wildflowers
  • Sweetheart Box

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
